title: Amarula bread and butter pudding with Amarula cream
ingredients: ['For the pudding', '250g French bread - slightly stale and cut into slices 1cm (1/2 in) thick', '100g butter', '50g raisins', '600ml (1 pint) milk', '375ml double cream', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '6 large eggs', '200g caster sugar', '125ml Amarula liqueur', '2 teaspoons icing sugar for dusting', 'For the Amarula cream', '150ml Amarula liqueur', '300ml double cream']
